amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 118-115 to delay implementation of H. R. 3799 until the Secretary of Labor certifies that legislation would not result in higher premium rates for older workers.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to delay implementation of H. R. 3799 until the Secretary of Labor certifies that legislation would not result in higher premium rates for older workers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 220 (Roll no. 278).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Hayes.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 220 (Roll no. 278).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
